member.name: MF_QUALITY_DROP_MODE
member.summary: Specifies how aggressively a pipeline component should drop samples.

member.name: MF_QUALITY_DROP_MODE.MF_DROP_MODE_NONE
member.summary: Normal processing of samples. Drop mode is disabled.

member.name: MF_QUALITY_DROP_MODE.MF_DROP_MODE_5
member.summary: Fifth drop mode (most aggressive, if it is supported; see Remarks).

member.name: MF_QUALITY_DROP_MODE.MF_NUM_DROP_MODES
member.summary: Maximum number of drop modes. This value is not a valid flag.
